name: Legacy of Litter Gulch
description:
In the unforgiving Wild West, cats don't have nine lives... So you'd better make the most of the one you got. 

-+- Test your reflexes in this one-button, arcade-inspired game... Featuring a little narrative and a little cat.

-+- First game I've developed entirely by myself.  

-+- Created as a semester final project in 2 weeks.
